DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability preliminary therapeutic efficacy multiple dose intravenous infusion CFZ533 monoclonal antibody patient primary Sjögren 's syndrome ( pSS )
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Pharmacokinetics Preliminary Efficacy Study CFZ533 Patients With Primary Sjögren 's Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis primary Sjögren 's syndrome ESSDAI score ≥ 6 Secondary Sjögren 's syndrome Receiving cyclosphosphamide , corticosteroid bolus dose 1 mg/kg , rituximab , belimunab , immunosuppressive . At significant risk thromboembolic event Clinically significant systemic infection Significant elevate risk infection
